format: html

```{r, message=F, warning=FALSE}
# install packages
install.packages(c("R2jags", "rjags", "coda", "dplyr"))
library(rjags)
library(coda)
library(dplyr)
set.seed(440)
```
```{r}
# load data
load("strokeStudy.RData")
df <- x
```

```{r}
# outcome: 1 = home/rehab, 0 = other
df$y <- ifelse(df$homeOrRehab == TRUE, 1, 0)
df$site <- as.numeric(factor(df$siteID))
df$program <- ifelse(df$Time2 >= 4, 1, 0)
J <- length(unique(df$site))

# covariates
df$female <- ifelse(df$Gender == "Female", 1, 0)
df$ems <- ifelse(df$EMSvsCar == "EMS", 1, 0)
df$tpa <- ifelse(df$hadTPA == TRUE, 1, 0)
df$thr <- ifelse(df$hadThrombectomy == TRUE, 1, 0)
```

```{r}
# missing variables: drop remaining NAs for these variables
vars_used <- c("y","site","program","Age","female","ems","tpa","thr")

df_cc <- df[ , vars_used]   # select variables
df_cc <- na.omit(df_cc)     # drop rows with NA

N <- nrow(df_cc)
J <- length(unique(df_cc$site))
```

```{r}
# jags variables
data_jags <- list(
  N = N,
  J = J,
  y = df_cc$y,
  site = df_cc$site,
  program = df_cc$program,
  age = as.numeric(scale(df_cc$Age)), # centering/scaling
  female = df_cc$female,
  ems = df_cc$ems,
  tpa = df_cc$tpa,
  thr = df_cc$thr
)

params <- c("beta0", "beta_prog", "beta_age", "beta_female",
            "beta_ems", "beta_tpa", "beta_thr",
            "mu_alpha", "sigma_alpha"
)

inits <- function() {list(
  beta0 = 0,
  beta_prog = 0,
  beta_age = 0,
  beta_female = 0,
  beta_ems = 0,
  beta_tpa = 0,
  beta_thr = 0,
  mu_alpha = 0,
  sigma_alpha = 1,
  alpha = rnorm(J, 0, 0.1)
)}
```

```{r}
# bayesian model fit
bayes_fit <- jags(
  data = data_jags,
  inits = inits,
  parameters.to.save = params,
  model.file = "bayesian_model.jags",
  n.chains = 4,
  n.iter = 5000,
  n.burnin = 2000,
  n.thin = 2
)

print(bayes_fit)
```
